## RgbppLeapFromBtcToCkbCombinedParams interface

Parameters for combining the leap operation of RGBPP assets from Bitcoin to CKB.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export interface RgbppLeapFromBtcToCkbCombinedParams 
```
